title: Do. The. Math.
author: VD
content_html:
I wasn’t worried at all before. But this morning, I couldn’t help laughing.

The inauguration of President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris will conclude with a star-studded primetime special. The “Celebrating America” program will be carried live by ABC, NBC, CBS, CNN, MSNBC and online from 8:30 to 10 p.m. ET/PT on Wednesday, Jan. 20.

The show will be hosted by actor Tom Hanks and will include performances by singers Demi Lovato, Justin Timberlake, Ant Clemons, and Jon Bon Jovi. It will also feature remarks from Biden and Harris.

My first thought was that this had to be a joke, but apparently it’s not. I always wondered how those medieval kings pulled things like this off… I mean, how on Earth did they not see it coming?

Now consider this. I was kicked off Twitter years ago. I’ve had nothing to do with it since. Why would anyone there even know, let alone care about, what I’m posting on my personal blog?

Had to stop looking at twitter. So much trash talking VD over there today.

UPDATE: They’re even bringing in an Illuminati whore. I’m just surprised Jay-Z and Beyonce aren’t being featured as well.

Lady Gaga and Jennifer Lopez will perform at the inauguration of President-elect Joe Biden on January 20.

I wasn’t worried at all before. But this morning,
I couldn’t help laughing
.
The inauguration of President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris will conclude with a star-studded primetime special. The “Celebrating America” program will be carried live by ABC, NBC, CBS, CNN, MSNBC and online from 8:30 to 10 p.m. ET/PT on Wednesday, Jan. 20.
The show will be hosted by actor Tom Hanks and will include performances by singers Demi Lovato, Justin Timberlake, Ant Clemons, and Jon Bon Jovi. It will also feature remarks from Biden and Harris.
My first thought was that this had to be a joke, but apparently it’s not. I always wondered how those medieval kings pulled
things like this
off… I mean, how on Earth did they not see it coming?
Now consider this. I was kicked off Twitter years ago. I’ve had nothing to do with it since. Why would anyone there even know, let alone care about, what I’m posting on my personal blog?
Had to stop looking at twitter. So much trash talking VD over there today.

They’re even bringing in an Illuminati whore. I’m just surprised Jay-Z and Beyonce aren’t being featured as well.
Lady Gaga and Jennifer Lopez will perform at the inauguration of President-elect Joe Biden on January 20.
